Lynn.1984 U.S. Women's Open Golf Championship: The 1984 U.S. Women's Open Golf Championship was the 39th U.S. Women's Open, held July 12–15 at Salem Country Club in Peabody, Massachusetts. Hollis Stacy won her third U.S. Women's Open, one stroke ahead of runner-up Rosie Jones. It was Stacy's fourth and final major title.
